newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian Central Bank sells 289.20 bln rbls bonds.
newsitem.headline: Russian Central Bank sells 289.20 bln rbls bonds.

text.p: The Central Bank sold 289.20 billion roubles nominal of OFZ interest-bearing government bonds and VSM bonds on behalf of the Finance Ministry on Friday, the bank's open-market operations department said.
The bank made the following transactions:
The bank did not say at what price the paper was sold. The 22VSM03305 issue closed on Friday at 99.60 percent, the 22011 issue closed at 100.92 percent, and 24012 issue closed at 100.06 percent.

Apart from intervening on its own account for liquidity-smoothing and monetary policy purposes, the Central Bank buys and sells securities as part of its management of the Finance Ministry's debt and asset portfolio.
